scripts.deploy contracts on localhost: npx env-cmd -f .env.deploy-localhost npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy #1 on localhost: npx env-cmd -f .env.deploy-localhost npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/oneArtist/evolving/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy #2 on localhost: npx env-cmd -f .env.deploy-localhost npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/oneArtist/existing/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy #3 on localhost: npx env-cmd -f .env.deploy-localhost npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/manyArtists/evolving/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy contracts on sepolia: npx env-cmd -f .env.deploy-sepolia npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.js --network sepolia
scripts.deploy #1 on sepolia: npx env-cmd -f .env.deploy-sepolia npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/oneArtist/evolving/deploy.js --network sepolia
scripts.deploy #2 on sepolia: npx env-cmd -f .env.deploy-sepolia npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/oneArtist/existing/deploy.js --network sepolia
scripts.deploy #3 on sepolia: npx env-cmd -f .env.deploy-sepolia npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/manyArtists/evolving/deploy.js --network sepolia
scripts.deploy #3 on mumbai: npx env-cmd -f .env.deploy-mumbai npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/manyArtists/evolving/deploy.js --network mumbai
scripts.deploy contracts on mainnet: npx env-cmd -f .env.deploy-mainnet npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.js --network mainnet
scripts.deploy #1 on mainnet: npx env-cmd -f .env.deploy-mainnet npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/oneArtist/evolving/deploy.js --network mainnet
scripts.deploy #2 on mainnet: npx env-cmd -f .env.deploy-mainnet npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/oneArtist/existing/deploy.js --network mainnet
scripts.deploy #3 on mainnet: npx env-cmd -f .env.deploy-mainnet npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/manyArtists/deploy.js --network mainnet
scripts.build && deploy only hosting:main: firebase use default && env-cmd -f .env.main react-app-rewired build && firebase deploy --only hosting:main
scripts.build && deploy only hosting:prod: firebase use prod && env-cmd -f .env.prod react-app-rewired build && firebase deploy --only hosting:prod
scripts.build && deploy only functions:main: firebase use default && firebase deploy --only functions --force
scripts.build && deploy only functions:prod: firebase use prod && firebase deploy --only functions --force
scripts.build && deploy only preview: firebase use default && env-cmd -f .env.preview react-app-rewired build && firebase hosting:channel:deploy marketplace --only main --expires 2d
